articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Active Secretaries of Primary Organizations of KPA Youth League
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Active Secretaries of Primary Organizations of KPA Youth League
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un had a photo session with the participants in the fourth conference of active secretaries of primary organizations of the youth league of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 He warmly congratulated the secretaries of primary organizations and young officials of the youth league of the KPA who are fully demonstrating the resourcefulness and bravery of youngsters at the posts standing guard over the homeland and at major sites for building a socialist power, while actively defending, explaining and implementing the Workers' Party of Korea's idea of prioritizing the youth and arousing soldiers into heroic feats.
					
					 Expressing expectation and conviction that the participants in the conference would turn the primary organizations of the youth league of the army into elite vanguard ranks in the flames of the Songun revolution and creditably fulfill the sacred mission and duty they have assumed before the times and the revolution in the van of the Korean youth movement as required by the modeling the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, he had a photo session with them.
					
					 Present at the photo session were leading officials of the KPA General Political Bureau including Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Rejects UNSC "Presidential Statement"
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Rejects UNSC "Presidential Statement"
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation clarified the following principled stand categorically rejecting the "presidential statement", cooked up by the UNSC over the DPRK's recent successful launch of intermediate-range strategic ballistic rocket, at the plenary third session of the Geneva Disarmament Conference on August 30:
					 The intermediate-range strategic ballistic rocket launching drill staged by the Strategic Force of the Korean people's Army on Aug. 29 is a curtain-raiser to strong countermeasures against the hostile forces' Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					
					 We had already served a meaningful warning that we would keep an eye on the U.S. moves, but the U.S. responded to it with the bellicose war exercises for aggression.
					
					 There is no guarantee that the huge armed forces which amassed in south Korea will not go over into action, now that the military tension on the Korean peninsula has reached its climax.
					
					 The present touch-and-go situation on the peninsula is entirely attributable to the U.S.
					
					 The UNSC turned its face away from our complaint over the said joint war exercises and again cooked up the "presidential statement", a product of the U.S.-led anti-DPRK plots and clear evidence of unfair double standards. We, therefore, categorically reject it.
					
					 If the U.S. acts rashly, despite our repeated warnings that the U.S. should ponder over the disastrous consequences to be entailed by its reckless military provocation, we will take a more powerful counteraction.

articles.title: DPRK Public Health Delegation Leaves for Maldives
articles.content:
DPRK Public Health Delegation Leaves for Maldives
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A DPRK public health delegation led by Jang Jun Sang, minister of Public Health, left here on Saturday to attend the 70th South-East Asia Regional Assembly of the WHO to be held in Male of Maldives.

articles.title: Methane-Pipelined Houses Built
articles.content:
Methane-Pipelined Houses Built
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Methane-pipelined dwelling houses were completed in Sepho area of the DPRK.
					 According to data available, over 2,680 methane tanks were built for hundreds of dwelling houses with pens.
					
					 In this regard, Kim Chol Ho, an official in charge of building work, told KCNA:
					
					 Methane tanks fit in with actual conditions of Sepho area. They are highly appreciated by householders in rural communities for being easy to build and convenient to use.
					
					 The Sepho tableland, a large-scale stockbreeding base, is abundant in the sources of raw materials for methane production, as the number of livestock is on steady increase there.

articles.title: Fixtures for International Games in September
articles.content:
Fixtures for International Games in September
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Men's and women's football teams of the DPRK will take part in different games sponsored by AFC in September.
					 The DPRK and Lebanon teams belonging to Group B for the 2019 AFC Asian Cup qualification will play a match at Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang on September 5.
					
					 On September 13, the second match of the inter-zone semifinals for the 2017 AFC Cup between the April 25 team of the DPRK and the Bengaluru FC of India will take pace at the May Day Stadium in Pyongyang.
					
					 And a DPRK women's team belonging to Group B of the 2017 AFC U-16 Women's Championship will play against Japanese, Australian and Bangladeshi rivals. The DPRK team won the title of the 2015 AFC U-16 Women's Championship by beating the Japanese elevens in the finals.
					
					 Meanwhile, a DPRK men's team will have a series of games with Hong Kong of China, Taipei of China, Macao of China and Brunei teams as part of preliminaries for the 2018 AFC U-16 Championship.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Discloses Aggressive Nature of Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Discloses Aggressive Nature of Ulji Freedom Guardian
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S.-south Korea joint military drill Ulji Freedom Guardian, which used to drive the situation on the Korean peninsula to the worst phase, sparked off serious concerns of international community this year, too, for its provocative nature.
					 Jorge Goffre, a Venezuelan analyst on international situation, when interviewed by Telesur TV of Venezuela, said that although it was billed as an "annual one with defensive nature," the DPRK termed the joint military rehearsal as a military threat and provocation because it was staged when the military tension between the DPRK and the U.S. reached its climax. If a country hostile to the U.S. conducts a military drill in the geographically near region such as Mexico and Cuba, the U.S. would noisily brand it as a military threat and provocation to itself, he added.
					
					 As the world knows, the excuse of the U.S. talking about "defensive nature" of the joint military drill cannot work on anyone.
					
					 The Ulji Freedom Guardian is a very dangerous nuclear war drill as its purpose is to easily "achieve" invasion of the DPRK by "neutralizing in the shortest period" the military commanding system of the DPRK, its nuclear and rocket bases, in particular, through toughest preemptive strike by all attack means of the three services.
					
					 Ahead of the military drill, the U.S. tried to mislead the opinion by claiming it was a military game while talking about "reduction of U.S. troops" and "computer war game orientation". But the south Korean KBS on August 18 confirmed that the priority of the drill would be to "early expel the north headquarters under the simulated conditions of a total war."
					
					 The operation for "preemptive attack" and "elimination of headquarters" in the joint military drill is just the same with war frenzy of the U.S. administration vociferating about "fire and fury". This clearly proves its aggressive and provocative nature.
					
					 Four American brass hats who are responsible for the operation of military attack on the DPRK flew into south Korea and directly supervised the joint drill on the spot during the period.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the U.S.-south Korea joint military drill, held every year according to the U.S. strategy for world domination, is not for "defense" but for attack and real war.
					
					 The "annual and regular joint military drill" touted by the U.S. is the annual and regular hostile policy and nuclear threat and blackmail toward the DPRK. This fact shows that the U.S. admitted the responsibility for the escalated tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK will never step back even an inch from the road of bolstering the country's nuclear force unless the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat are radically liquidated.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Noble Comradeship of Great Men of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Noble Comradeship of Great Men of Mt Paektu
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday runs an article telling about noble comradeship of leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un with the lapse of 17 years after unconverted long-term prisoners came to the embrace of the motherland.
					 The article says:
					
					 The unconverted long-term prisoners, who had been at the door of death being called as "breathing fossil", are now leading a blessed life in happiness and glory envied by all people. This is the exciting reality originated from noble comradeship of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu.
					
					 It was the intention of Kim Jong Il to give the greatest honor and happiness to the unconverted long-term prisoners who devoted themselves to the country and the nation and national reunification with the invariable faith and sense of obligation to the party and the leader.
					
					 Thanks to his warm love and sense of obligation, there took place a historic event in which 63 unconverted long-term prisoners came to the embrace of the motherland on September 2, Juche 89 (2000).
					
					 His boundless love and benevolence served as an elixir of life for the unconverted long-term prisoners to give vitality of youth to their bodies hurt by the enemies.
					
					 Kim Jong Il saw to it that remains of the unconverted long-term prisoners who passed away were buried in the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery so that their life can be always remembered by the country and posterity.
					
					 Unconverted long-term prisoners are dedicating themselves to the patriotic cause, although they are at advanced ages, under the loving care of Kim Jong Un who is putting his heart and soul into the work for glorifying their lives with the same love as that shown by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Going Reckless
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Going Reckless
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the commander of the south Korean puppet marine corps together with his American master went to islands in the hotspot waters of the West Sea, asserting the need to "open fire with the firm determination if an enemy makes a provocation".
					 Meanwhile, special warfare units of the puppet navy staged a drill for striking mobile launching system of the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary ridicules this as a rashness of warmongers.
					
					 It says:
					
					 Though the puppet forces kick off war hysteria, backed by the U.S., they are more than scabby sheep.
					
					 If we fire, they will die. This is the inescapable fate of the puppet warmongers.
					
					 The puppet military gangsters should always be mindful that if they pretend to be brave, they would not save their skins as they have neither measure nor capability to cope with the ensuing consequences. 
					
					 It is as foolish an act as exposing the neck under straw cutter to dare counter the world-level military power equipped with powerful nuclear striking means.
					
					 If the south Korean puppet forces continue to go reckless, misjudging the surging resentment and will of our army and people, they would face a horrible disaster.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Japan's Intention of Fueling Regional Tension
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Japan's Intention of Fueling Regional Tension
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The Japan Defense Ministry decided to introduce American-made new type interceptor missile system Aegis Usher under the pretext of countering the DPRK's ballistic missile technology development.
					 Japan is openly opting for military actions with the U.S. The ultra-right media is calling for demonstration of solidarity between Japan and the U.S. and containing the DPRK. It is against this backdrop that Prime Minister Abe had discussion with foreign minister and defense minister and instructed the tightened solidarity between Japan and the U.S. to cope with "threats" from the DPRK.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday derides this as a senseless act beyond one's capabilities.
					
					 Revealing the intention sought by Japan going impudently while clamoring about "missile threat", the commentary says:
					
					 It is the invariable ambition of the Japanese reactionaries to realize the old dream of "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" by abusing the situation in Asia-Pacific that has been rendered tense.
					
					 The present Japanese ruling quarters granted the "Self-Defense Forces" the right to exercise the "right to collective self-defense" and expanded the scope of the SDF's overseas operation. By stepping up the moves for turning the country fascist and militarist through the enactment in succession of such evil laws as law on protection of specific secrets and law on punishment of organized crimes, Japan is going to retrogressively revise the constitution in order to legally justify its overseas aggression.
					
					 But the retrogressive revision of the constitution has faced strong denunciation at home and abroad and the present Japanese ruling quarters are suffering consecutive defeats in the local elections.
					
					 It is now finding the way out in rendering the hostility toward the DPRK extreme and instilling militarist idea into society.
					
					 The commentary stresses that should Japan fuel the acute regional situation, it can be laid between life and death.

articles.title: Action against Additional THAAD Deployment Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action against Additional THAAD Deployment Staged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- An action against the puppet authorities' additional THAAD deployment was reportedly staged outside the THAAD deployment base in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea on Aug. 30.
					 Inhabitants in Songju County and Kimchon City held a press conference that day to declare the period of people's emergency action against the additional THAAD deployment.
					
					 At the conference, they stressed that they would set the first period of emergency action from the day to Sept 6.
					
					 An appeal adopted there said that failure to check THAAD would drive south Korea as a whole into war crisis.
					
					 After the press conference, there were a rally of members of various civic organizations and inhabitants.
					
					 The ralliers declared that they would check the additional THAAD deployment at any cost.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK War Games and THAAD Deployment Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK War Games and THAAD Deployment Protested in S. Korea
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life in south Korea staged a one-man demo outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul from August 21 to 31 to demand halt to the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills by the U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers and withdrawal of THAAD, according to the south Koran online paper Tongil News.
					 The demonstrators accused Trump of inciting the war crisis on the Korean peninsula to sell weapons to south Korea.
					
					 They stressed the need to ensure peace environment by replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace accord and stop the joint military exercises before anything else.
					
					 They strongly urged the authorities to retract the THAAD deployment in south Korea.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists' Destruction of Historical Relics Revealed in Kaesong City
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists' Destruction of Historical Relics Revealed in Kaesong City
Kaesong, September 2 (KCNA) -- Fresh evidence reveal the high-profile crimes of the U.S. imperialists which ruthlessly destroyed the cultural heritage of the Korean nation in Kaesong City during the past Korean War.
					 Scores of mortar shells and butterfly bombs were recently found again at the construction sites around the Nam Gate of Kaesong and Kwandok Pavilion and a rusted machine-gun bullet lodged in Yonbok Temple Bell, one of five famous bells of Korea.
					
					 In the area of Kaesong alone, more than 20 historical relics of national treasure were severely destroyed by the U.S. imperialist air raids during the war.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House of Russia brought out in booklet leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-Based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" on August 22 to mark the 57th anniversary of the start of his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun-based revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is an effective political mode in the present era that carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line on attaching importance to the army, and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode most correctly meeting the requirements of the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Exploits Lauded by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Exploits Lauded by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Aug. 23 to mark the Day of Songun of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership serves as a historic landmark in the Korean revolution.
					
					 With his Songun leadership, he developed the Korean People's Army into the invincible powerful revolutionary Paektusan army which can beat any formidable enemy.
					
					 It is thanks to his Songun exploits that the DPRK could turn into a nuclear weapons state and a world-level military power.
					
					 We extend eternal glory to Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, outstanding Songun brilliant commander.

articles.title: Organization of DR Congo Praises Education in DPRK
articles.content:
Organization of DR Congo Praises Education in DPRK
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A drive for building an education power and powerhouse of talents is now brisk in the DPRK thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un laying a solid foundation for the country's prosperity.
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo stressed this in an article posted on its website on Aug. 29.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un authored such works as "Let Us Make a Revolution in Education in the New Century to Glorify Our Country as the One of Education and a Power of Talents" and "On the Basic Tasks Facing Kim Il Sung University in the New Era of the Juche Revolution" to clearly indicate the orientation and ways for putting the education of the country on a fresh higher level, as required by the new era of knowledge-based economy.
					
					 He made sure that a decree on the enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education was promulgated at the 6th Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, and wisely guided the work to reasonably improve the general secondary education including educational conditions and environment as required by the specific conditions of the country and world trend.
					
					 Thanks to his leadership, the universal 12-year compulsory education started in the DPRK.
					
					 Higher education system enabling the country to train more able talents has been prepared and remote-controlled education system established to pave a broad avenue to making all the people well versed in science and technology.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con secretarios de organizaciones de base de UJ del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con secretarios de organizaciones de base de UJ del EPC
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un se fotografio junto con los participantes en la IV Conferencia de Activistas de los Secretarios de Organizaciones de Base de la Union de la Juventud del EPC.
					El Maximo Dirigente felicito calidamente a los secretarios de las organizaciones de base y otros funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud del EPC quienes siendo defensores, propagandistas y ejecutores activos de la idea del PTC de dar importancia a los jovenes llaman a los militares a la creacion de las proezas heroicas y manifiestan sin reservas la inteligencia y valentia de la juventud en los puestos de defensa da la patria y los lugares importantes de la construccion de potencia socialista.
					
					Kim Jong Un se fotografio junto a los participantes en la conferencia expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos convertiran las organizaciones de base de la Union de la Juventud del EPC en las filas de vanguardistas selectas en el fragor de la revolucion del Songun conforme a la demanda de la verificacion de todo el ejercito segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y cumpliran magnificamente su mision y deber sagrados concedidos por la epoca y la revolucion en el frente del movimiento juvenil de Corea.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So y otros funcionarios responsables de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.

articles.title: Delegacion coreana rechaza la "declaracion presidencial" de CS de ONU
articles.content:
Delegacion coreana rechaza la "declaracion presidencial" de CS de ONU
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En el pleno de la tercera sesion de la Conferencia de Ginebra sobre el Desarme convocado el 30 del mes expirado, la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea aclaro la posicion de principios rechazando totalmente la "declaracion presidencial" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, fabricada en relacion con el exitoso lanzamiento del cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance de la RPDC.
					El entrenamiento del lanzamiento del cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance, realizado el dia 29 por las fuerzas estrategicas del Ejercito Popular de Corea, no pasa de ser un preludio de las resueltas contramedidas contra los ejercicios conjuntos militares Ulji Freedom Guardian de las fuerzas hostiles, asi apunto la delegacion y continuo:
					
					Ya hicimos la advertencia significativa que la RPDC observara la conducta de EE.UU., pero el imperio respondio con el simulacro belicoso y agresivo.
					
					En la actual situacion tan tirante creada en la Peninsula Coreana, no hay ninguna garantia de que la inmensa cantidad de fuerzas armadas concentradas en el Sur de Corea no pasara a la guerra real.
					
					Recae totalmente a EE.UU. la responsabilidad de haber llevado al borde de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La "declaracion presidencial" inventada nuevamente por el CS de la ONU dando espaldas a la acusacion de la RPDC sobre las maniobras militares, deviene el producto de la campana intrigante anti-RPDC auspiciada por EE.UU. y la expresion de la injusta pauta de doble rasero. De ahi, la RPDC rechaza totalmente el documento.
					
					Tomaremos las contramedidas mas duras si EE.UU. sigue actuando sin prudencia al ignorar las reiteradas advertencias de la RPDC de meditar las consecuencias catastroficas a ser producidas por las aventuras militares de EE.UU.

articles.title: Japon no debe mas incitar la situacion de la region, aconseja Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japon no debe mas incitar la situacion de la region, aconseja Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de Defensa de Japon determino la aplicacion del ultramoderno sistema de misiles interceptores norteamericanos, Aegis Usher, bajo el pretexto de hacer frente al desarrollo de la tecnologia del cohete balistico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Por otra parte, Japon toma parte activa en las acciones militares con EE.UU. y los medios de prensa ultraderechistas lo abogan por la manifestacion de solidaridad con EE.UU. e intencion de mantener a rayas a la RPDC.
					
					Bajo tales circunstancias, el premier japones, Abe, se reunio con el canciller y el ministro de Defensa y les ordeno estrechar el vinculo con EE.UU. frente a la "amenaza" de la RPDC.
					
					Esto es una locura absurda inadecuada a su propia capacidad.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este sabado y revela la intencion del pais isleno que habla tanto de la "amenaza de misiles" de la RPDC como sigue:
					
					Lograr a toda costa el viejo sueno de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental" aprovechando la tirante situacion de la region de Asia-Pacifico, es la ambicion invariable de los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					La actual capa gobernante japonesa concedio el derecho al ejercicio del "derecho a la autodefensa colectiva" a las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa", poniendo en vigencia en 2016 la ley de seguridad, y amplio mas la escena de actividades de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" en ultramar.
					
					Ademas, da acicate a la fascitizacion y la militarizacion del pais inventando una tras otra las leyes infames incluyendo la de proteccion de secreto especial y la de castigo del crimen organizado y trata de enmendar a fuerzas la constitucion para legalizar la agresion al ultramar.
					
					Pero, la enmienda constitucional fue censurada fuertemente dentro y fuera del pais y la capa gobernante sufre sucesivas derrotas en las elecciones locales.
					
					De ahi, los reaccionarios japoneses buscan la salida en la militarizacion de toda la sociedad al agrandar la hostilidad a la RPDC.
					
					Pero, Japon debe tener presente que su imprudencia traera la autodestruccion.
